snippet: Mr. Trump alluded to abortions happening “on the final day.” Doctors say that scenario does not happen....
abstract: Doctors say description of late-term abortion given by Donald Trump in presidential debate is absurd and point out that late-term abortions are extremely rare, in any case.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump alluded to abortions happening “on the final day.” Doctors say that scenario does not happen.

headline.main: Trump Said Women Get Abortions Days Before Birth. Doctors Say They Don’t.
headline.print_headline: ‘Absurd’ Trump Errs on Abortion, Doctors Say
